mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY a.PRDCT_NO DESC) RNUM, a.* , c.ACNT_NM , b.COM_DET_CODE_NM FROM PRODUCT a , COM_DET_CODE_INFO b , ACNT c WHERE a.PRDCT_CLSF_CD = b.COM_DET_CODE AND a.ACNT_NO = c.ACNT_NO ORDER BY a.PRDCT_DSCN_YN, a.PRDCT_NO desc

SELECT PROD.PRDCT_NO , PROD.PRDCT_CLSF_CD , PROD.PRDCT_NM , PROD.PRDCT_RCVN_AMT , PROD.PRDCT_EXPLN , PROD.PRDCT_PRCHS_STRT_DT , PROD.PRDCT_PRCHS_END_DT , PROD.PRDCT_DSCN_YN , PROD.ALLERGENS_YN , PROD.HQ_INVEN_CNT , PROD.HQ_INVEN_PROPER_CNT , PROD.ATCH_FILE_NO , ACNT.ACNT_NO , ACNT.ACNT_NM , ACNT_TEL , ACNT_ZIP , ACNT_ADDR , ACNT_DTL_ADDR , ACNT_MNGR_PSTN , ACNT_MNGR_NM , ACNT_EMAIL , ACNT_CLSF_CD , ATCH.STRE_FILE_NM , COMDET.COM_DET_CODE_NM FROM PRODUCT PROD, ATCH_FILE ATCH, COM_DET_CODE_INFO COMDET, ACNT ACNT WHERE PROD.PRDCT_NO = #{prdctNo} AND PROD.PRDCT_CLSF_CD = COMDET.COM_DET_CODE AND PROD.ACNT_NO = ACNT.ACNT_NO AND PROD.ATCH_FILE_NO = ATCH.ATCH_FILE_NO
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET PRDCT_CLSF_CD = #{prdctClsfCd}, PRDCT_NM = #{prdctNm}, PRDCT_RCVN_AMT = #{prdctRcvnAmt}, PRDCT_EXPLN = #{prdctExpln}, PRDCT_PRCHS_STRT_DT = #{prdctPrchsStrtDt}, PRDCT_PRCHS_END_DT = #{prdctPrchsEndDt}, PRDCT_DSCN_YN = #{prdctDscnYn}, ALLERGENS_YN = #{allergensYn}, HQ_INVEN_CNT = #{hqInvenCnt}, HQ_INVEN_PROPER_CNT = #{hqInvenProperCnt}, ACNT_NO = #{acntNo}, ATCH_FILE_NO = #{atchFileNo} WHERE PRDCT_NO = #{prdctNo}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRDCT_NM LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
